title: Chris Whitty – 2020 Statement on New Strain of Virus
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Chris Whitty, the Chief Medical Officer, on 19 December 2020.
content:
As announced on Monday, the UK has identified a new variant of Covid-19 through Public Health England’s genomic surveillance.
